Job Titles: Website Content Creator and SEO Manager
Job Details:
Location: Remote
Company: PUREPROGRESS
PUREPROGRESS is a young and international logistics company and customs broker based in Switzerland. We pride ourselves on our innovative approach to logistics, offering comprehensive solutions to meet the diverse needs of our clients worldwide.
We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Website Content Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating engaging, relevant, and high-quality content for our website, tailored to meet our specific requirements. The content creator should have a good understanding of SEO, basic knowledge of WordPress, and a foundational understanding of HTML to ensure content is optimized for both users and search engines. This is a remote position, and the selected candidate will be responsible for the following tasks:
Content Creation: Write, edit, and publish website content, including blog posts, articles, landing pages, and other web content, according to the guidelines and requirements provided.
SEO Optimization: Implement SEO best practices in all written content to improve organic search rankings, including keyword research, meta tags, and internal linking.
Content Management: Use WordPress to create, edit, and manage website content, ensuring consistency in tone, style, and message.
Basic HTML: Utilize basic HTML skills to format content correctly within WordPress, including the use of headers, bullet points, links, and images.
Research: Conduct research on industry-related topics to generate innovative and relevant content ideas.
Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to develop content strategies and campaigns that align with company goals.
Proofreading and Editing: Review and edit content to ensure it is free of grammatical errors and adheres to the company’s style guidelines.
Performance Tracking: Monitor and analyze website traffic and user engagement metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of content strategies and make necessary adjustments.
Requirements:
Experience: Proven work experience as a content creator, copywriter, or similar role. Experience with WordPress is essential.
Skills: Basic knowledge of HTML for content formatting. Strong understanding of SEO principles and content optimization.
Writing Ability: Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a keen eye for detail.
Technical Skills: Familiarity with WordPress CMS. Basic knowledge of SEO tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SISTRIX, Yoast SEO).
Research Skills: Ability to research and generate content ideas that are relevant and engaging to our target audience.
Time Management: Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Preferred Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in English, Journalism, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Experience in digital marketing or content marketing.
Familiarity with graphic design tools (e.g., Canva) is a plus.
Knowledge of additional content management systems and plugins.
Previous experience as a freight forwarding and logistics services clerk or in customs brokerage.
Exceptional English skills are mandatory.
Advanced German language skills are highly appreciated and will be considered a significant asset.
What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible working hours with remote work options.
Opportunity to work in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
Professional development opportunities.
In your application, please include your desired monthly salary.
If you meet the qualifications and are interested in joining our dynamic team, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.
Job Types: Full-time, Fresh graduate
Pay: Rp6,000,000 - Rp9,000,000 per month
Education:
SMP (Preferred)
Experience:
content creation: 1 year (Preferred)
logistics: 1 year (Preferred)
Language:
German (Preferred)
English (Preferred)
Expected Start Date: 09/30/2024

Job Titles: Website Content Uploader and On-Page Optimization Specialist
Job Details:
About Us:PlacidWay is a dynamic and forward-thinking company specializing in Medical Tourism Industry. We are committed to providing high-quality content and an excellent user experience on our website. We are looking for a skilled individual to join our team as a Website Content Uploader and On-Page Optimization Specialist.
Responsibilities:
Content Uploading:
Upload and manage content on our website using various content management systems (CMS) and editors.
Ensure all content is accurately formatted and displays correctly on the website.
Regularly update website content to keep it fresh and relevant.
Page Design:
Design and arrange web pages to ensure an appealing and user-friendly layout.
Utilize design tools such as Canva to create and edit images and graphics for the website.
Ensure consistency in style, fonts, images, and tone across the website.
On-Page Optimization:
Optimize website content for search engines using best on-page SEO practices.
Conduct keyword research and implement SEO strategies to improve page rankings.
Optimize meta tags, headers, URLs, and other elements to enhance search engine visibility.
Monitor and analyze website performance using tools like Google Analytics and make data-driven adjustments to improve site performance.
Collaboration and Communication:
Collaborate with content creators, graphic designers, and marketing teams to ensure cohesive content and design.
Communicate effectively with team members to manage workflow and meet deadlines.
Requirements:
A degree in Marketing, Communications, Web Design, or a related field is preferred but not required. Relevant work experience will also be considered.
Proven experience in uploading and managing website content using various CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress, Joomla, Drupal).
Proficiency in design tools such as Canva or similar for creating and editing images.
Strong understanding of on-page SEO best practices and techniques.
Familiarity with HTML/CSS is a plus.
Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Job Type: Full-time
Application Question(s):
How frequently have you updated website content in your previous roles to keep it fresh and relevant?
What experience do you have with designing and arranging web pages to create an appealing and user-friendly layout?
What are your strategies for optimizing website content for search engines? Can you give an example of a successful SEO project you have worked on?
Please provide a link to your portfolio or examples of previous work relevant to this position.
Experience:
Data Entry on Webpages: 1 year (Preferred)
Language:
English (Required)

100% Remote

We are seeking a WordPress Developer responsible for both back-end and front-end development, including creating WordPress themes and plugins. The candidate should have a strong understanding of industry trends and content management systems. Experience with responsive and adaptive design is strongly preferred. Also, an understanding of the entire web development process, including design, development, and deployment is preferred.

Minimum 3+ years of experience.
Front-end development with HTML 5, CSS & jQuery
WordPress template development
WordPress back-end customization and extension
Managing and Building WIX Sites
Expert knowledge of WordPress (Plugin/theme development / API), PHP, HTML, JavaScript, and CSS
Strong experience building HTML/CSS across the major browsers and minimizing load times
Identifying areas that can be improved and turning that into functionality from start to finish
Experience building mobile-optimized / responsive sites with Touch screen optimization, Retina / High-DPI optimization, and Small-screen optimized navigation
GOOD TO HAVE
PHP, Ajax, and MySQL knowledge
Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator

Experience designing user interfaces (UI) that feature Interactive elements, Animated elements, and Design principles such as white space, simplicity, chunking, proximity, weight, context, Visual cues, signposts, focus, and conventions
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Manage all aspects of Website development, Management, SEO, and SEM
A PLUS IF YOU HAVE

Full-time work schedule

Job Titles: Financial Controller at Intanah Pte. Ltd.
Job Details:
Position: Financial Controller
Location: Bali, Indonesia
Company: Intanah Pte Ltd
Website: intanah.com
Reports to: CFO/CEO
Type: Full-Time
About Us:

Intanah Pte Ltd is one of the world’s most exciting resort development and management companies, focusing on creating exceptional resorts across Southeast Asia. We are committed to delivering unparalleled luxury experiences and sustainable developments that harmonize with the natural environment.

We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Financial Controller to join our resort management team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing the financial operations of the resort, ensuring accuracy and compliance with financial regulations, and providing strategic financial guidance to support the resort's overall business goals.

Key Responsibilities:

Financial Reporting: Prepare and present accurate and timely financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, cash flow reports, and variance analysis.

Budget Management: Develop, monitor, and manage the resort’s annual budget, including forecasting and variance analysis to ensure financial targets are met.

Internal Controls: Establish and enforce robust internal control procedures to safeguard assets, mitigate financial risks, and ensure compliance with corporate policies and legal requirements.

Cost Management: Monitor and control operating expenses, conduct cost-benefit analyses, and recommend cost-saving measures to improve profitability.

Audit Coordination: Coordinate internal and external audits, ensuring compliance with financial regulations and corporate governance standards.

Financial Planning: Provide financial insights and strategic recommendations to the management team, supporting long-term financial planning and decision-making.

Team Leadership: Supervise and mentor the finance team, ensuring efficient and effective financial operations, including payroll, accounts payable/receivable, and general ledger maintenance.

Cash Flow Management: Monitor cash flow, optimize working capital, and manage relationships with banks and financial institutions to ensure adequate liquidity.

Tax Compliance: Oversee tax planning, compliance, and reporting, ensuring timely and accurate filing of all tax returns.

Financial Systems: Oversee the implementation and maintenance of financial systems and software to improve financial reporting and operational efficiency.

Vendor and Contract Management: Review and negotiate contracts with vendors and suppliers, ensuring favorable terms and cost-effectiveness.

Apply Now:

If you are ready to take on this exciting challenge and make a significant impact on our company’s success, please send your resume and cover letter to this job ads or email to susan@intanah.com.

Join us in creating extraordinary resort experiences and shaping the future of hospitality!

Requirements

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field; CPA or equivalent certification preferred.

Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in financial management, preferably in the hospitality or resort industry.

Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial reporting, budgeting, and internal controls.

Proficiency in financial management software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP, Oracle) and advanced Excel skills.

Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities.

Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with various departments.

Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

High level of integrity, professionalism, and attention to detail.

Benefits
Benefits:

Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.

Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field; CPA or equivalent certification preferred.

Integrity Asia is looking for a WordPress Developer.
The WordPress Developer's assignment is to build, customize, and optimize websites using the CMS WordPress, focusing on creating scalable, secure, and performant solutions. This position is also responsible for developing custom themes and plugins, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsive design. Technical tasks include utilizing PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for frontend and backend development and integrating third-party APIs.
What You’ll Do:
Website Development: Craft or enhance themes and plugins using WordPress Codex. Ensure every site you touch is mobile-friendly and looks fantastic across all devices and browsers.
Backend Development: Manage and optimize databases, implement custom features, and handle seamless migrations between environments.
Site Optimization: Speed is everything! You'll implement caching, minification, image optimization, and more to keep our sites running at top speed.
API Integration: Connect our websites with third-party services, secure API keys, and create powerful shortcodes and widgets that bring the frontend to life.
What We’re Looking For:
At least 3 years of hands-on WordPress development. 
A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, IT, or Software Engineering.
Technical Skills: Mastery of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and deep knowledge of the WordPress platform, including hooks, filters, actions, and APIs. Database management with MySQL is a must.
Language Skills: Proficiency in Bahasa Indonesia and English (verbal and written).
Bonus Skills: A strong understanding of UI/UX principles and server/web hosting administration.
Why You’ll Love Working Here:
Work in a dynamic, multicultural environment where your contributions truly matter.
Be part of a team that values integrity, innovation, and enthusiasm.
Enjoy the satisfaction of seeing your work directly impact our success.
About Us:  
Integrity Indonesia is a foreign investment company that has operated for 22 years in Indonesia. Our business is to provide services related to the prevention, detection and investigation of fraud.
Our services include employment background screening, whistleblowing systems, mystery shopping services, due diligence, process serving, research & market intelligence, asset tracing, skip tracing, claims investigations, brand protection, anti-counterfeiting, trademark investigation and market surveys.
For more information, please see our website: www.integrity-asia.com

Job Titles: Analyst - Deloitte Digital - Business Analyst (Technical) - ID
Job Details:
Analyst - Deloitte Digital - Business Analyst (Technical) - ID
Date: 17 Aug 2024
Service Line / Portfolios: Customer & Marketing
Location: Jakarta, ID
Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

What you will do

This role is with Deloitte Digital Southeast Asia. Across all clients and sectors, we believe great customer experiences create greater impact. That elevating the human experience creates enduring value, for the organization, for the customer, for society, for all.

You will be responsible for the following:
Requirements Gathering and Analysis:
Collaborate with clients and stakeholders to understand business objectives and mobile application requirements.
Conduct in-depth analysis of existing systems and processes to identify opportunities for improvement.

Agile Project Management:
Facilitate agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, backlog grooming, and sprint reviews.
Monitor project progress, identify risks, and proactively address challenges to ensure timely and high-quality deliverables.

Client Communication:
Maintain clear and effective communication with clients, providing regular updates on project status and addressing any concerns or feedback.
Gather client feedback to continuously improve mobile solutions and enhance user satisfaction.

Technical Translation and Design:
Translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Gather technical requirements, feedback, and comments from client domain architects, solution architects, and various system analysts.
Collaborate with client technical teams to provide solution design.
Conduct technical requirement briefings with developers.

System Architecture and Implementation:
Understand system architecture and project cutovers for specific features.
Contribute to step-by-step procedures for implementing new features.
Prepare workflows connecting various host systems.
Prepare technical requirement documentation.

Technical Changes and Documentation:
Identify changes to APIs or UI designs, such as field names, field types, field validation, and API execution flow.
Identify host systems that need to be connected by the frontend application.
Document the business logic to be applied in the backend code.
